DOC.brief_summary: The study has two goals. First to develop a computer-based intervention meant to alter cognitive biases that contribute to ongoing PTSD symptoms. Second, we sought to pilot test the intervention in a small sample of veterans for feasibility and acceptability.
DOC.criteria: Participated in ground combat operations in Vietnam Scored 40 80 on PTSD Checklist Military version Availability and willingness to attend 2x weekly computer sessions for 6 weeks Active substance dependence Significant cognitive impairment Current and active suicidal or homicidal ideation
